meta.description:
Red Star Plastic Factory produces 6 types of plastic containers, with their capacities, demands, and variable costs shown in Table 5-11.
Table 5-11
\begin{tabular}{c|c|c|c|c|c|c}
\hline Container Code & 1 & 2 & 3 & 4 & 5 & 6 \
\hline Capacity $(\mathrm{cm}^3)$ & 1500 & 2500 & 4000 & 6000 & 9000 & 12000 \
Demand/units & 500 & 550 & 700 & 900 & 400 & 300 \
Variable Cost/(¥/unit) & 5 & 8 & 10 & 12 & 16 & 18 \
\hline
\end{tabular}

Each type of container is produced using different dedicated equipment, with a fixed cost of ¥1200. When the quantity of a certain container cannot meet the demand, containers with larger capacities can be used as substitutes. How should production be organized to minimize the total cost while meeting the demand?

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each container type in cm^3

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand for each container type in units

params.name: variable_cost
params.description: Variable cost per unit for each container type

params.name: fixed_cost
params.description: Fixed cost for using equipment for each container type

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units produced for each container type

vars.name: y
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if equipment for a container type is used

objective.name: total_cost
objective.expr: quicksum(variable_cost[c] * x[c] + fixed_cost * y[c] for c in C)

constraints.name: demand_2
constraints.description: Meet demand for container type 2, allowing substitution

constraints.name: demand_3
constraints.description: Meet demand for container type 3, allowing substitution

constraints.name: demand_4
constraints.description: Meet demand for container type 4, allowing substitution

constraints.name: demand_5
constraints.description: Meet demand for container type 5, allowing substitution

constraints.name: equipment_usage_1
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 1

constraints.name: equipment_usage_2
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 2

constraints.name: equipment_usage_3
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 3

constraints.name: equipment_usage_4
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 4

constraints.name: equipment_usage_5
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 5

constraints.name: equipment_usage_6
constraints.description: Link production and equipment usage for container type 6
